page.title: 08Employment(2)
page.content: Also in Bromsash is a plant nursery.The same people have been living in the house for nineteen years.They employ two full-time workers and one part-time worker.They sell house and bedding plants and also pot plants.Customers come from all over the area and include local people too. There is a saw-mill on the edge of the village.One man has been working there for twenty-five year.He employs two people full-time.The wood comes from the Forestry Commission from Gorsley,Cirencester and around London. The wood he uses is oak,elm,chestnut and larch.The wood goes to the Midlands and South Wales.The machines they use are band saws and four chain saws.They have two big lorries,a crane,a tractor loader and a four-wheel drive vehicle.
